overview: Three portraits, in relation to the Punk spirit, of Didier Ozil dressed in black, aggressive air, Gabriel Pouget, expressive in his passivity, St√©phane Varinard, puts charcoal on his face to disappear. Superimposed on the faces, the group Marie and the boys, the play of lights inside the Le Palace club in Paris and a country cemetery.
title: Triptyque
